V.ii.1.B.1.b
.
Handling Unsworn or Uncertified Testimony
Make an exact copy of unsworn or uncertified testimony and return the original copy for notarization or certification to the
claimant
representative, or
person testifying.
Note
:  Return unsworn or uncertified testimony only if the rating activity (or a Decision Review Officer) considers the evidence material to a favorable determination of a claim.
Reference
:  For more information on certifying testimony, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.D.3
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Reviewing Testimony and Lay Evidence
